lyrics.ChnStr: 爱淹没了你 你才抓住了我
lyrics.Pinyin: 爱[ài]淹[yān]没[méi]了[le]你[nǐ] 你[nǐ]才[cái]抓[zhuā]住[zhù]了[le]我[wǒ]
lyrics.EngStr: Love overwhelmed you, only then did you grasp me

lyrics.ChnStr: 你逗留多久 我没有问过
lyrics.Pinyin: 你[nǐ]逗[dòu]留[liú]多[duō]久[jiǔ] 我[wǒ]没[méi]有[yǒu]问[wèn]过[guò]
lyrics.EngStr: How long you'll stay, I never asked

lyrics.ChnStr: 痛痛哭了你 你泪湿了我
lyrics.Pinyin: 痛[tòng]痛[tòng]哭[kū]了[le]你[nǐ] 你[nǐ]泪[lèi]湿[shī]了[le]我[wǒ]
lyrics.EngStr: You cried painfully, your tears soaked me

lyrics.ChnStr: 你被谁伤透 你从没有说
lyrics.Pinyin: 你[nǐ]被[bèi]谁[shuí]伤[shāng]透[tòu] 你[nǐ]从[cóng]没[méi]有[yǒu]说[shuō]
lyrics.EngStr: Who hurt you deeply, you never said

lyrics.ChnStr: 如果你没勇气陪我到
lyrics.Pinyin: 如[rú]果[guǒ]你[nǐ]没[méi]勇[yǒng]气[qì]陪[péi]我[wǒ]到[dào]
lyrics.EngStr: If you don't have the courage to stay with me until

lyrics.ChnStr: 明天的 明天的 明天
lyrics.Pinyin: 明[míng]天[tiān]的[de] 明[míng]天[tiān]的[de] 明[míng]天[tiān]
lyrics.EngStr: Tomorrow's tomorrow's tomorrow

lyrics.ChnStr: 倒不如 就忘了 就断了
lyrics.Pinyin: 倒[dǎo]不[bù]如[rú] 就[jiù]忘[wàng]了[le] 就[jiù]断[duàn]了[le]
lyrics.EngStr: Better to forget it, end it

lyrics.ChnStr: 寂寞的 昨天的 昨天
lyrics.Pinyin: 寂[jì]寞[mò]的[de] 昨[zuó]天[tiān]的[de] 昨[zuó]天[tiān]
lyrics.EngStr: The lonely yesterday's yesterday

lyrics.ChnStr: 谁都不必道歉 只是苦会多一点
lyrics.Pinyin: 谁[shuí]都[dū]不[bù]必[bì]道[dào]歉[qiàn] 只[zhī]是[shì]苦[kǔ]会[huì]多[duō]一[yī]点[diǎn]
lyrics.EngStr: No one needs to apologize, just a bit more bitterness

lyrics.ChnStr: 既然你爱错了我 认错是终点
lyrics.Pinyin: 既[jì]然[rán]你[nǐ]爱[ài]错[cuò]了[le]我[wǒ] 认[rèn]错[cuò]是[shì]终[zhōng]点[diǎn]
lyrics.EngStr: Since you loved me by mistake, admitting the mistake is the end

lyrics.ChnStr: 如果你没勇气陪我到
lyrics.Pinyin: 如[rú]果[guǒ]你[nǐ]没[méi]勇[yǒng]气[qì]陪[péi]我[wǒ]到[dào]
lyrics.EngStr: If you don't have the courage to stay with me until

lyrics.ChnStr: 明天的 明天的 明天
lyrics.Pinyin: 明[míng]天[tiān]的[de] 明[míng]天[tiān]的[de] 明[míng]天[tiān]
lyrics.EngStr: Tomorrow's tomorrow's tomorrow

lyrics.ChnStr: 倒不如 就算了 就放了
lyrics.Pinyin: 倒[dǎo]不[bù]如[rú] 就[jiù]算[suàn]了[le] 就[jiù]放[fàng]了[le]
lyrics.EngStr: Better to let it go, set it free

lyrics.ChnStr: 空虚的 昨天的 昨天
lyrics.Pinyin: 空[kōng]虚[xū]的[de] 昨[zuó]天[tiān]的[de] 昨[zuó]天[tiān]
lyrics.EngStr: The empty yesterday's yesterday

lyrics.ChnStr: 你就在我眼前 但别再爱我一天
lyrics.Pinyin: 你[nǐ]就[jiù]在[zài]我[wǒ]眼[yǎn]前[qián] 但[dàn]别[bié]再[zài]爱[ài]我[wǒ]一[yī]天[tiān]
lyrics.EngStr: You're right in front of me, but don't love me for another day

lyrics.ChnStr: 别看我 别爱我 别怪我 闭上双眼
lyrics.Pinyin: 别[bié]看[kàn]我[wǒ] 别[bié]爱[ài]我[wǒ] 别[bié]怪[guài]我[wǒ] 闭[bì]上[shàng]双[shuāng]眼[yǎn]
lyrics.EngStr: Don't look at me, don't love me, don't blame me, close your eyes
